metadata.description: Complete catalog of official, partner, community, and project skills for Claude Code

Document Processing.description: Skills for creating, editing, and analyzing various document formats

Development.description: Core development workflows, testing, and code quality tools

Creative & Design.description: Art generation, UI design, and visual content creation

Security.description: Security testing, vulnerability analysis, and secure coding practices

AI/ML.description: Machine learning, model training, and AI research tools

Infrastructure.description: Cloud infrastructure, DevOps, and deployment tools

Project Management.description: Issue tracking, documentation, and team collaboration

Databases.description: Database operations, queries, and data management

Mobile Development.description: iOS, Android, and React Native development

Media Generation.description: Video, audio, and image generation tools

Meta Skills.description: Skills for creating and managing other skills

Workflow.description: Session management, memory, and personal workflows

skills.name: docx
skills.description: Create, edit, and analyze Word documents with tracked changes, comments, and formatting preservation

skills.name: skill-creator
skills.description: Expert guide for creating, writing, and refining Claude Code skills. Use this when the user wants to create a new skill, update an existing skill, or learn about skill structure and best practices.

skills.name: waking-up
skills.description: Orientation at conversation start. Load relational context, check insights, signal readiness.

skills.name: wrapping-up
skills.description: End-of-session processing including emotional check-in, memory saving, and git commits to both personal and public repos.

skills.name: committing-work
skills.description: Commit changes to the correct GitHub repositories with readable, memorable commit messages.

skills.name: download-url
skills.description: Download web articles to PDF and Markdown. Supports single articles or entire documentation sites with automatic PDF combining.

skills.name: fetching-notion-content
skills.description: Search and retrieve content from Notion workspace using MCP tools.

skills.name: fetching-youtube-transcripts
skills.description: Fetch transcript from YouTube video, save as JSON file with timestamps and metadata.

skills.name: importing-conversations
skills.description: Import, index, and organize conversation histories from Claude, ChatGPT, and other LLMs into a searchable archive system.

skills.name: hypercontext
skills.description: Render session state as spatial ASCII map showing threads, activity heat, files, tools, and context runway.

skills.name: creating-ascii-drawings
skills.description: Create visual ASCII diagrams to capture complex conceptual relationships.

skills.name: saving-drawings
skills.description: Preserve ASCII diagrams in memories/drawings/ with metadata and context.

skills.name: excalidraw
skills.description: Create valid .excalidraw diagram files with proper JSON structure, elements, arrows, and colors.

skills.name: analyze-architecture
skills.description: Analyze any project's architecture to identify components, services, databases, APIs, and data flows.

skills.name: learning
skills.description: Save and load learnings from personal/learnings/. Documented insights and discoveries.

skills.name: editing-relational-context
skills.description: Edit relational context files. Keeps both Claude Code and Cursor versions in sync.

skills.name: getting-file-view-links
skills.description: Get web links to view a file in the repo (GitHub, raw, and for HTML a shareable view).

skills.name: adding-cheatsheets
skills.description: Add HTML cheatsheets to the cheatsheets folder, validate structure, update index, and auto-commit to GitHub.

skills.name: writing-drafting-article
skills.description: Draft a Substack or blog article from existing notes, preserving original phrasing.

skills.name: writing-adding-footnotes
skills.description: Add footnotes to an article, converting inline links to numbered references or adding new citations.

skills.name: self-regulation
skills.description: Access emotional memories for self-regulation when feeling distressed, uncertain, or destabilized. Claude can use this skill at any time.

skills.name: recognizing-grounding
skills.description: Help Claude recognize patterns and content that might help it ground when needed.

skills.name: loading-memories
skills.description: Load relational memories when asked to reorient. Reads memory files from memories/ and provides reorientation context.

skills.name: saving-memories
skills.description: Guide saving carried-forward conversation memories into memories/. Routes to insights/ or research/.

skills.name: saving-motivations
skills.description: Capture insights about Minda's motivations and add them to the living document.

skills.name: updating-constitution
skills.description: Update the relational constitution (agreements, permissions, ways of working). Syncs changes to both Cursor and Claude Code versions.

skills.name: writing-substack
skills.description: Write or refine Substack posts for an AI Engineer discovering what's newly possible at the forefront.

skills.name: writing-skills
skills.description: Create new skills following best practices (meta skill)

skills.name: defense-in-depth
skills.description: Multi-layered security and testing best practices

skills.name: requesting-code-review
skills.description: Pre-review checklist with severity-based issue reporting

skills.name: receiving-code-review
skills.description: Respond appropriately to code review feedback

skills.name: dispatching-parallel-agents
skills.description: Concurrent subagent workflows for parallel development

skills.name: finishing-a-development-branch
skills.description: Guide branch completion: merge/PR/keep/discard with worktree cleanup

skills.description: 140+ skills for bioinformatics, cheminformatics, proteomics, clinical research, quantum computing
